description.value:
You quickly snatch up whatever's nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Interact]{Interact} to pick up a nearby object you could use as an improvised weapon. It must be located at around your chest level, such as a mug on a table, rather than an object on the floor. You then either Strike or make an @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Improvised Pummel]{Improvised Pummel} with the improvised weapon.
